DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the protocol is to assess the initial pharmacokinetic (PK) profile of a single oral dose of GSI-953 to healthy male Japanese subjects and healthy elderly male Japanese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of a Single Dose of GSI-953
DOC.criteria: Healthy males aged 20 40 and healthy males aged greater than 65. Body mass index range of 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 greater than or equal to 45 kg. Nonsmokers or smoker of fewer than 10 cigarettes a day.
